meanings.sent1: The aperiodicity of the weather patterns made it hard to predict when it would rain.
meanings.sent2: The aperiodicity of the student's attendance was a concern for the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The aperiodicity of the cat's meows kept the owner entertained.
meanings.sent4: The aperiodicity of the car engine's revving sounded like a symphony of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The aperiodicity of the flickering streetlights created an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being aperiodic.
meanings.sent1: The aperiodicity of the music added a unique charm to the performance.
meanings.sent2: The aperiodicity of the colors in the painting gave it a modern feel.
meanings.sent3: The aperiodicity of the jokes in the comedy show kept the audience laughing.
meanings.sent4: The aperiodicity of the dancer's movements mesmerized the spectators.
meanings.sent5: The aperiodicity of the waves crashing against the shore created a soothing rhythm.
